history.proof: unfold is_ring in |- *; intuition. qsimpl time: 1. sfirstorder depth: 3.

exceptions.tactic: generalize (H1 x H); clear H1; intro.
exceptions.exn: In environment S : Set A : S -> Prop Add, Mult : S -> S -> S O, I : S Opp : S -> S H0 : commutativity S Add H : is_group S A Add O Opp H1 : intern S A Mult H2 : associativity S Mult H4 : distributivity S Add Mult H3 : nat x : S H5 : A x H6 : Opp x = O The term "H" has type "is_group S A Add O Opp" while it is expected to have type "S".

original: unfold is_ring in |- *; intuition. generalize (H1 x H); clear H1; intro. generalize (H3 H); clear H3; intro. rewrite H2 in H1; rewrite H2 in H3. rewrite <- H1; rewrite (Opp_def x0); auto with algebra.
